serverBusy.queueFull: Our servers are working hard right now! Please try again in a few minutes.

quotaLimit.title: Daily Quota Reached
quotaLimit.message: Become a sponsor to get more video generation quota!

noTags.title: Image Recognition Failed
noTags.message: You can still generate a video, but you won't be able to publish it to the gallery. Consider re-uploading the image or try a different image.

nsfwRealistic.title: Publishing Restricted
nsfwRealistic.message: This image is detected as NSFW and photo-realistic. You can generate a video, but it cannot be published to the gallery.

dailyQuota.title: Daily Video Quota

dailyQuota.resetInfo: Your quota resets daily at midnight. Sponsor benefits include higher daily limits.

profile.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters

sponsor.title: Sponsor Tier
sponsor.claimDescription: If you're a supporter or sponsor, you can claim your tier to unlock additional benefits and quota.
sponsor.usernameHelp: Enter the username associated with your sponsor account on UniFans
sponsor.confirmBenefit: You'll receive the {role} role with corresponding daily quota.
sponsor.confirmNoRole: This sponsor tier is not configured to provide additional benefits. No role or quota changes will be applied.
sponsor.tokenExpired: Sponsor feature temporarily unavailable. The authentication token has expired. Please contact the administrator.

errors.alreadyClaimed: This sponsor has already been claimed by another user

success.upToDate: Your sponsorship is up to date
